snippet.description: validates_acceptance_of ...
validates_associated ...
validates_confirmation_of ...

snippet.text: validates_each :${1:attribute} do |record, attr, value| record.errors.add attr, "${2:message}" if $0 end
snippet.description: validates_each ... Validates each attribute against a block
validates_exclusion_of ... Validates that the value of the specified attribute is not in a particular enumerable object
validates_format_of ... Validates whether the value of the specified attribute is of the correct form by matching it against the regular expression provided
validates_inclusion_of ... Validates whether the value of the specified attribute is available in a particular enumerable object.
validates_length_of ... Validates that the specified attribute matches the length restrictions supplied. Only one option can be used at a time
validates_numericality_of ... Validates whether the value of the specified attribute is numeric
validates_presence_of ... Validates that the specified attributes are not blank

snippet.text: :on => :${1:default is save, other options are create or update}$0
snippet.description: :on ... Specifies when this validation is active (default is :save, other options :create, :update)

snippet.text: :if => Proc.new {|instance| ${1:some code that checks your instance}$0
snippet.description: :if => Proc.new ... Specifies a proc to call to determine if the validation should occur
:if => :method_name ... Specifies a method to call to determine if the validation should occur
:allow_blank ... If set to true, skips this validation if the attribute is blank
:allow_nil ... Skip validation if attribute is nil
:message ... A custom error message
:too_long ... The error message if the attribute goes over the maximum for validates_length_of
:too_short ... The error message if the attribute goes under the minimum for validates_length_of
:wrong_length ... The error message if using the :is method and the attribute is the wrong size for validates_length_of
:accept ... Specifies value that is considered accepted. The default value is a string "1" for validates_acceptance_of
:with ... The regular expression used to validate the format with for validates_format_of
:in ... Specify an enumerable object of available items validates_inclusion/exclusion_of
:is ... The exact size of the attribute for validates_length_of
:maximum ... Specifies the maximum value for validates_length_of
:minimum ... Specifies the minimum value for validates_length_of
:within ... A range specifying the minimum and maximum size of the attribute for validates_length_of
:only_integer for validates_numericality
:greater_than ... Specifies the value must be greater than the supplied value for validates_numericality_of
:greater_than_or_equal_to ... Specifies the value must be greater than or equal the supplied value for validates_numericality_of
:equal_to ... Specifies the value must be equal to the supplied value for validates_numericality_of
:less_than ... Specifies the value must be less than the supplied value for validates_numericality_of
:less_than_or_equal_to ... Specifies the value must be less than or equal the supplied value for validates_numericality_of
:odd ... Specifies the value must be an odd number for validates_numericality_of
:even ... Specifies the value must be an even number for validates_numericality_of
